attributes.action: Provide funds for a new TV show to be made called 'Bennetts Bennett'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have an idea for a new show called 'Bennetts Bennett', it is simple, you have to wear a K Bennett mask and smoke huge cuban bruisers and scare the public. You also have to throw pretend grenades into public places, these are called 'Taylors Timebombs'.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
